00037 #include "CAudio.h"
00038 
00039 // DirectSound includes
00040 #include <dsound.h>
00041 #include <mmsystem.h>
00042 
00043 
00045 // CDirectSoundAudioBuffer Description
00046 //
00047 // Implements the rest of the IAudioBuffer interface left out by CAudioBuffer.  
00048 // If you are interested in implementing a sound system using OpenAL 
00049 // you'd create a class OpenALAudioBuffer from CAudioBuffer.
00050 // 
00052 
00053 class CDirectSoundAudioBuffer : public CAudioBuffer
00054 {
00055 protected:
00056         LPDIRECTSOUNDBUFFER m_Sample;
00057 
00058 public:
00059         CDirectSoundAudioBuffer(LPDIRECTSOUNDBUFFER sample, shared_ptr<CSoundResource> resource);
00060         virtual void *VGet();
00061         virtual bool VOnRestore();
00062 
00063         virtual bool VPlay(int volume, bool looping);
00064         virtual bool VStop();
00065         virtual bool VResume();
00066 
00067         virtual bool VTogglePause();
00068         virtual bool VIsPlaying();
00069         virtual void VSetVolume(int volume);
00070 
00071         virtual float VGetProgress();
00072 
00073 private:
00074         HRESULT FillBufferWithSound( );
00075         HRESULT RestoreBuffer( BOOL* pbWasRestored );
00076 };
00077 
00078 
00079 
00081 // CDirectSoundAudio Description
00082 //
00083 // Implements the rest of the IAudio interface left out by CAudio.  
00084 // If you are interested in implementing a sound system using OpenAL 
00085 // you'd create a class OpenALAudioBuffer from CAudioBuffer.
00086 // 
00088 
00089 class CDirectSoundAudio : public CAudio
00090 {
00091 public:
00092         CDirectSoundAudio() { m_pDS = NULL; }
00093         virtual bool VActive() { return m_pDS!=NULL; }
00094 
00095         virtual IAudioBuffer *VInitAudioBuffer(shared_ptr<CSoundResource> soundResource);
00096         virtual void VReleaseAudioBuffer(IAudioBuffer* audioBuffer);
00097 
00098         virtual void VShutdown();
00099         virtual bool VInitialize(HWND hWnd);
00100 
00101 protected:
00102 
00103     IDirectSound8* m_pDS;
00104 
00105         HRESULT SetPrimaryBufferFormat( DWORD dwPrimaryChannels, 
00106                                                                         DWORD dwPrimaryFreq, 
00107                                                                         DWORD dwPrimaryBitRate );
00108 };
